msg.msgText:
Tests the connection to the LDAP server. To test an existing connection, enter the command with no parameters. To test a new LDAP configuration, enter the command with the LDAP server "URL", and optionally the BindDN, BindPassword, and Certificate parameters.
SYNTAX: imaserver test LDAP help imaserver test LDAP imaserver test LDAP "Item1=value1" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver test LDAP "URL=ldap://127.0.0.1:389" "BindDN=cn=abcd" "BindPassword=xxxxx" imaserver test LDAP
Configuration items for the "LDAP" object: URL URL to connect to the LDAP server, including protocol. BindDN Distinguished name to use when binding to LDAP. For anonymous bind, leave blank. BindPassword Password to use when binding to LDAP. For anonymous bind, leave blank. Certificate Name of the SSL certificate to use for the LDAP over SSL connection.
